title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Workshop on Designing an Instructor-Centered Curriculum Support System

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive three major educational challenges faced by instructors (e.g., time constraints, resource shortages) through needs analysis.
Learners can comparatively analyze at least three exemplary support service cases from other institutions based on benchmarking results.
Learners can propose at least one team-based instructional support system design strategy considering educational environmental constraints.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
